mapper.insert: insert into hq_withdraw_check (user_id, trans_no, withdraw_amt, withdraw_fee, create_time, check_status, check_admin, check_time, pay_status, pay_admin, pay_time, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, remark, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hq_withdraw_check set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trans_no = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_amt = #{withdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdraw_fee = #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_admin = #{checkAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_admin = #{payAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bank_code = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where hq_withdraw_check_id = #{hqWithdrawCheckId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select hq_withdraw_check_id, user_id, trans_no, withdraw_amt, withdraw_fee, create_time, check_status, check_admin, check_time, pay_status, pay_admin, pay_time, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, remark, update_time from hq_withdraw_check where hq_withdraw_check_id = #{hqWithdrawCheckId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select hq_withdraw_check_id, user_id, trans_no, withdraw_amt, withdraw_fee, create_time, check_status, check_admin, check_time, pay_status, pay_admin, pay_time, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, remark, update_time from hq_withdraw_check
